title: No power interruption during President’s address today
body_lines: No power interruptions will be in place in any part of the country during the time when President Gotabaya Rajapaksa makes a special address.
The President is scheduled to address the nation tonight at 8.30 pm.
According to the demand management power shedding schedule announced yesterday for today, there was no power interruptions mentioned between 8.00 pm and 9.30 p.m.
Power cuts will end at 8.00 pm this evening and will come to effect from 9.30 pm in the designated segments. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
